headline: FedEx (FDX) Valuation Check As Shares Trade Above Narrative Fair Value Estimate
summary: FedEx stock performance snapshot FedEx (FDX) has drawn attention after recent trading, with the shares last closing at $308.18. Investors are weighing this price against the company’s value score of 2 and US$90.1b in revenue. The stock shows mixed recent returns, including a 1.6% decline over the past day, a 1.2% decline over the past week, and gains over the past month and past 3 months, alongside a 14.7% total return over the past year.
